alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Plymouth; Northern Bristol; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 2:56AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...BRIEF LIGHT SNOW SHOWERS AND SPOTTY LIGHT FREEZING RAIN MAY RESULT IN SLIPPERY SPOTS EARLY THIS MORNING ESPECIALLY ON BRIDGES AND OVERPASSES... Brief light snow showers along with spotty light freezing rain will develop across portions of Rhode Island and Southeast Massachusetts toward daybreak. The greatest risk for this very light wintry precipitation is near the south coast. Temperatures below freezing may result in slippery spots developing for the morning commute. This is especially true on bridges and overpasses. Motorists are urged to drive with caution early this morning. The threat of this very light wintry precipitation will come to an end by late morning as temperatures rise above freezing.
